description: Vana is the first network for user-owned data
title: Vana | User-Owned Data
introduction: The first network for user-owned data, advocating for an open internet where users own their data and the AI models they contribute to.
targetPeople: Researchers, AI developers, and users interested in data ownership

faqs.question: What is the main goal of the network?
faqs.answer: To create an open internet where users own their data and the AI models they contribute to.

faqs.question: How are AI models created in this network?
faqs.answer: AI models are created iteratively by a community, similar to open source software.

faqs.question: Who contributes to the foundation model?
faqs.answer: 100M users who contribute their data and compute.
